# 智能合约

智能合约是存在区块链上的一段代码，按照他们的编码逻辑执行。智能合约能够读取其他的智能合约，做出判断，发送以太币或者执行其他智能合约。合约会一直存在，直到燃料用完或者执行完毕。智能合约一般少于300行代码。

### 编译智能合约

[在线编译器](http://remix.ethereum.org/)

##### 编写简单的智能合约

```javascript
pragma solidity ^0.4.0;

contract SimpleDemo {
    string storedData;
    
    function set(string num){
        storedData = num;
    }
    
    function get() constant returns (string retVal){
        return storedData;
    }
}
```

##### 编译成功后的bytecode,其中object是我们部署合约时需要用的数据

##### 编译成功后的ABI，用来调用智能合约

```javascript
[
	{
		"constant": false,
		"inputs": [
			{
				"name": "num",
				"type": "string"
			}
		],
		"name": "set",
		"outputs": [],
		"payable": false,
		"stateMutability": "nonpayable",
		"type": "function"
	},
	{
		"constant": true,
		"inputs": [],
		"name": "get",
		"outputs": [
			{
				"name": "retVal",
				"type": "string"
			}
		],
		"payable": false,
		"stateMutability": "view",
		"type": "function"
	}
]
```

### 部署智能合约

##### 去除ABI中的换行符

[去除换行符工具](https://www.textfixer.com/tools/remove-line-breaks.php)

##### 使用eth.contract定义一个合约类

```javascript
> sample=eth.contract([ { "constant": false, "inputs": [ { "name": "num", "type": "string" } ], "name": "set", "outputs": [], "payable": false, "stateMutability": "nonpayable", "type": "function" }, { "constant": true, "inputs": [], "name": "get", "outputs": [ { "name": "retVal", "type": "string" } ], "payable": false, "stateMutability": "view", "type": "function" } ])
{
    abi: [{
      constant: false,
      inputs: [{...}],
      name: "set",
      outputs: [],
      payable: false,
      stateMutability: "nonpayable",
      type: "function"
  }, {
      constant: true,
      inputs: [],
      name: "get",
      outputs: [{...}],
      payable: false,
      stateMutability: "view",
      type: "function"
  }],
```

##### 将合约部署上链

```
//合约的bytecode,注意需要在bytecode前面添加"0x"
>sampleHex=""
> theSample=sample.new(1, {from:eth.accounts[0], data:sampleHex,gas:3000000})
INFO [08-29|17:42:13.614] Submitted contract creation              fullhash=0x8778df583ae779b2ae3ec4930306dfdf68ea595ce689b378a3c105286d50852d contract=0x6E68dA80675A60E8E14E717D78A57e4A58F23075
{
  abi: [{
      constant: false,
      inputs: [{...}],
      name: "set",
      outputs: [],
      payable: false,
      stateMutability: "nonpayable",
      type: "function"
  }, {
      constant: true,
      inputs: [],
      name: "get",
      outputs: [{...}],
      payable: false,
      stateMutability: "view",
      type: "function"
  }],
  address: undefined,
  transactionHash: "0x8778df583ae779b2ae3ec4930306dfdf68ea595ce689b378a3c105286d50852d"
}

```

##### 查看这次交易的详情

```javascript
>eth.getTransactionReceipt("0x8778df583ae779b2ae3ec4930306dfdf68ea595ce689b378a3c105286d50852d")
{
  blockHash: "0x70fbc3b4ead223f80f54495243a12cfcc5b2e9cc6c764e80571e081f4bb9b3ff",
  blockNumber: 129,
  contractAddress: "0x6e68da80675a60e8e14e717d78a57e4a58f23075",
  cumulativeGasUsed: 246170,
  from: "0x436103625a1b0cc151aa880269a432a4d5ee4969",
  gasUsed: 246170,
  logs: [],
  logsBloom: "",
  root: "0xaadc95817ee64eecca31d43d2c2f28a05d7a5e76974246742358eeb56f47f200",
  to: null,
  transactionHash: "0x8778df583ae779b2ae3ec4930306dfdf68ea595ce689b378a3c105286d50852d",
  transactionIndex: 0
}

```

##### 合约命名

```javascript
> smaplecontract=sample.at("0x6e68da80675a60e8e14e717d78a57e4a58f23075")
{
  abi: [{
      constant: false,
      inputs: [{...}],
      name: "set",
      outputs: [],
      payable: false,
      stateMutability: "nonpayable",
      type: "function"
  }, {
      constant: true,
      inputs: [],
      name: "get",
      outputs: [{...}],
      payable: false,
      stateMutability: "view",
      type: "function"
  }],
  address: "0x6e68da80675a60e8e14e717d78a57e4a58f23075",
  transactionHash: null,
  allEvents: function(),
  get: function(),
  set: function()
}

```

##### 合约调用

合约调用有两种情况：

- 不改变链上数据，使用call方法，不花费以太币
- 改变链上数据，使用sendTransaction方法，花费以太币

```javascript
//调用合约get方法，不会改变链上数据，用call
> smaplecontract.get.call()
""

//调用合约set方法, 会改变链上数据，用sendTransaction
> smaplecontract.set.sendTransaction("9", {from:eth.accounts[0],gas:300000})
INFO [08-29|15:23:13.501] Submitted transaction                    fullhash=0xf455ed0a31aea19b5b76ab7e55dec614f4a00b2a68161d7ba98a726624ae4ef7 recipient=0x36dC9E6265cF05D656BAB50b452083294b3a60a8

//调用get方法，查看数据已被修改
> smaplecontract.get.call()
"9"

```
